11132.content:
Tea and mai were hanging out at Tea's apartment. The fairy style duelist was blown away by mai's prediction skills. "How'd you know harpie lady would be next in your deck"? Tea asked amazed. "It's a special skill of mine, like all duelist have". She then grew a playful smile. "I can make a prediction about you". Tea nodded, eager to hear her prediction. "I predict you will laugh if I touch you here". Mai said as she lightly scratched tea's sides, getting a small giggle fit out of her. "Hehehe how'd you know I was ticklish"? Mai simply smirked. "Like I said, prediction is my specialty and i'm never wrong". Mai scratched her sides again getting a laugh out of her junior. "Hahahahahaha quhihihit it". Mai kept that playful smile on her face. "And if I don't"? She attacked tea's armpits. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOT THERE

Mai's smile grew and she continued her playful assault. HAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHEHEASE STHOHOHOHOHOHOHOP Poor tea was laughing hysterically as her worst spot was tormented. Tea was covering her weak spot to no avail as she accidentally pinned mai's hands in her armpits, making the feeling worse. Tears of mirth were freely falling as mai tickled her relentlessly. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHEASE NOHOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHOHORE "Maybe I would stop if you actually wanted me too". Mai said. Tea was laughing harder every second but she knew mai was right. She was having fun although it tickled like mad. She couldn't recall the last time she laughed so hard. Silent took over and she soon surrender to her torture and leaned back on mai's lap as she laughed like a little girl. "See, that's a little better right"?

Tea was having fun with the older girl. Laughing her head off with no care in the world, she loved this. Minutes later, she couldn't take it anymore and finally fought off her laughter long enough to beg her to stop:for real this time. Mai complied and let the younger duelist to catch her breath. After a few minutes-
11132.title: Mai gives tea a ticklish prediction

111321.content:
Tears streamed down tea's face as her weak spot was tortured. The younger duelist was in hysterics but she had to admit, this was fun. When was the last time she just let loose and laughed like this? HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA-PFFTHAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Tea couldn't stop laughing and she only seemed to laugh harder every second. Tea's smile and laughter were both genuine. She was having a lot of fun with the harpy duelist.

"You haven't asked me to stop, assuming you can even talk anymore. Having fun, tea"? Mai asked the hysterical duelist. Tea couldn't even talk anymore and she could barely managed a nod. Tears streamed down her face and she couldn't care less. Her armpits, being her worst spot would keep her laughing for hours but she didn't mind. She enjoyed being tickled by her friends and mai was no exception. Minutes passed and she had completely succumbed to silent laughter. She had fallen backwards onto mai lap, crying from laughter. Mai had a playful smile on her face as she drove the younger girl to tears. She was kinda having fun with her and she could tell she was too.

Eventually, this became too much for her so with a deep breath:STOOOOOOOOOOPP GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORE IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIM GOHOHOHOHOHOHOHONA PEHEHEHEHEHEHEEEHEHEHEHE HHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Mai then stopped and let her friend catch her breath. Tea spent a good 10 minutes pulling herself together. "Are you ok"? Mai asked. Tea, finally able to talk without giggling nodded. "I'm fine. Man, that tickled more then I thought". Tea said rubbing said spot.

Afterwords the two went outside for a friendly duel. Tho mai saw that tea couldn't stop smiling.
111321.title: Mai did it again

Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha pahahahahahaybahahahahack huhuhuhuhuhuh? hahahahahhahahahahahahahahaha Tea was smiling , feeling victorious at first but she noticed something. Mai was laughing sure but not nearly as hard as she was. She was keeping her arms behind her head, leaning back on the couch laughing the whole time. Hehehehehehe yehehe*snrrk* I enjoy being tihihihihickled from tihihihme to tihihihihihihime. *snort* hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha With that said mai fell back into laughter. Tea was surprised by the information but was relieved she wasn't causing her discomfort. BUt a playful smile graced tea's face and she switched to mai's belly causing hysterical laughter from the older duelist. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHO NOHOHOHOHOHOHOT MY BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHELLY Mai's hands flew down to protect her weakness. "Did you predict this"? Tea teased. HAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEHEHEHERE PLEHEHEHEHEASE As much as mai enjoyed being tickled, her belly was where she couldn't stand it. Tears of hysteria flowed down her face as her weak spot was tormented.

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORE PLEHEHEHEHEHEHEASE STOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO IHIHIHIHIHIHIHIT Tea finally showed mercy but she had to admit, it was kinda fun having a powerful duelist like her laughing like a little girl. "Are you ok"? tea asked concerned. "I'm fine. It's been a while since I laughed like that". Mai said, panting. The two girls decided to have a friendly duel afterwords.

121.title: Akiza

1211.content:
Laughter rang out from carly's house as akiza told her when yusei took her and the twins out roller skating for the first time. Akiza could barley tell her when she lost balance and slammed into a poor waiter who happened to be carrying smoothies and nachos to another table. The food flew off the tray right into the poor dude's face. She then tried to help the waiter out only to fall on the customers table and her face ended up cover in both smoothie and nacho cheese.

She still remembered hearing the twins dying from laughing so hard and even using trying to suppress a few chuckles. With those words out both akiza and carly were in tears from laughing. "Hahahahahah yohohohou rehehally dhihd thahat" "Sahadly it was embarrassing but now it is kinda funny. He tried to help me up but he lost his grip from the smoothie and I ended up pulling him on down with me and he fell *snort* face first into the guy's nachos". Both girls fell into another laughing fit that lasted a good minute. "Guess your date with yusei didn't go so well huh"? Akiza turned red upon digesting her words. Stammering and embarrassed she tried to explain that it wasn't a date but all she could do was put her face in her hand turning redder every second. Carly snickered at her and poked akiza in the side, getting a ticklish squeak out of her. "It totally was a date. You like him don't you? " carly said and poked her again getting another squeak. "Stohop thahat tihickles" Akiza covered her mouth, regretting what she just said but carly just smirked at her. "Ticklish huh?" Akiza looked away, trying to deny it. Carly then ran her fingers across akiza's stomach generating laughs from the physic duelist.

Hahahahahaaha stohohohohp thahahahat Carly's smirk grew and she attacked hr stomach and sides getting laughing fits from the black rose. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA CAHAHAHAHAHAHRLY STOHOHOHOHOP "Just admit it was a date and that you do like him and maybe I will". Akiza couldn't respond since she was laughing too hard. She fell back on carly's lap, laughing like a little girl. Her face was turning red from her hysterics but she refused to say anything. Tears started streaming down her face as carly drove her crazy. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAH IT HAHAHAHAHAH WASN'T A DAHAHAHAHAHAHATE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOP Akiza couldn't stop laughing nor could she control herself. Her legs kicked out widely and she could barely defend herself from carly's playful torment.

Carly just shook her head smiling. "Wrong answer" Akiza was crying from laughing so hard but a part of her was having fun. She didn't get too many chances to let loose and laugh like this. Her smile was wide and genuine and laughter rang out nonstop but she felt like a kid again. She never got to experience this before and a part of her wanted it to continue. Finally, she couldn't take it anymore. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA OHOHOHOHOK I DOHOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHHOHO With that carly stopped and let her breathe. Akiza's face was beet red from laughing and her having to admit her feelings. "It's ok. I won't say anything" Carly reassured. Akiza smiled and thanked her. Akiza snickered to herself. "What's so funny"? "Hehehe I just realized. Aren't you the one crazy about jack"? Now it was carly's turn to turn red. Akiza covered her mouth, laughing at the now embarrassed reporter. Carly growled and started tickling akiza again. HAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHA OHOHOHOHOHOHK OHOHOHOHOHOHOHK IHIHIHIHIHM SOHOHOHOHOHORY HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STOHOHOHOHP "No way. This is payback for that smart remark". Akiza was dying from laughing so hard but a part of her kinda wanted this. So for the next few minutes, akiza was turned into a laughing little kid. And unbeknownst to carly, she was completely ok with that.
1211.title: Carly tickles akiza

Akiza and luna were hanging out at luna and leo's house. Leo on the other hand was out with yusei. The two female signers were just hanging out, talking about how they were adjusting to life. Akiza almost immediately turned red upon hearing the question. "N-n-n-n-n-n-n-n-no. T-that's*random stuttering*" Luna couldn't hold back a laugh. "Is it yusei? Akiza said nothing and looked away with a face redder then jack's dragon. Luna smirked and poked akiza's side, getting a small but adorable squeak from the black rose. "Oh, did that tickle?" Luna poked her again, getting a small giggle this time. "You're not ticklish, are you akiza?" Luna said teasing.

With that same smile, luna scribbled her fingers across akiza's ribs getting laughing fits from her. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA CUHUHUHUHUHUHUHU IHIHIHIHIHIT OUT HAHAHAAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAH THAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHA TICKLES Luna just laughed and tickled her sides. Akiza hugged herself, kicking her legs out at nothing. She had to admit, this was kinda fun but at the same time she could barely take it. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STHOHOHOHOHHOHOHOHOHHOHOHOHOHOHOP HAHAHAAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORE "Then tell me, who do you like"?

HAHAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHHAHAHAH YUHUHUHUHUHUSEI HAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHA STHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOP PLEASE Luna then stopped stared at akiza in awe. Akiza looked away. Her face red from laughing and embarrassment. Luna put a hand on her shoulder. "I promise not to tell anyone, that includes yusei himself". Akiza looked at the younger girl gratefully. "Thank you luna" Akiza said before adopting a playful smile.Soon-
1212.title: Luna

12121.content:
Before luna could register what was happening, she found herself laughing loudly as her stomach and ribs were tortured. HAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA WHAHAHAHAHATS TIHIHIHIHIHIS FOHOHOHOR "Payback" Akiza said with a playful smile. Poor luna was laughing hysterically as her stomach was tortured. Unfortunately for her, her stomach was her weakness. OHOHOHHOHOHK IHIHIHIHIHIM SOHOHOHOHOHOHRY HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA "Hmmm, I thought I heard something, guess not". Akiza said teasing. Luna was tearing up from laughing so hard but she was having fun.

Unbeknownst to akiza, luna enjoyed being tickled. While her stomach was her worst spot, her armpits were her favorite along with her brother, however, she was the more sensitive of the two. The poor kid laughed uncontrollably, tears now freely flowing down her face. Akiza then snaked her hand up luna's jacket sleeves and tickle her armpits. Luna cried from laughing so hard but she was enjoying herself but she could tell akiza was too. Akiza soon noticed something. Although luna was in complete hysterics, her smile was genuine. She hadn't attempted to fight back, in face she had her arms up the whole time. "She's enjoying this" Akiza thought. After a few minutes of laughter, akiza stopped. "You were enjoying yourself." Luna froze for a second before sighing. "I guess you got me. I enjoy being tickled, mainly by leo. It's how we cheered each other up when we were little. Even now, it's still kinda fun." Akiza smiled and gave her a small pat on the head. "I'll keep this secret and you keep mine, deal?" Luna nodded with a smile. Both girls then decided to pass the rest of their time with a duel.

122.title: Carly

1221.content:
Akiza had decided to go to carly's house to see how she was doing after the whole dark signer incident. When she arrived she saw that the reporter was struggling with something. She was on her couch, face scrunched up in frustration. "Are you ok ,carly?" Akiza asked. "*Groan* I wanted too try to get info for a report on the dark signers but not a single person is telling me anything. Heck, I was apparently a dark signer but I can't remember anything". Akiza flinched back at her dramatics. "She really needs to relax" Akiza thought to herself. Suddenly, she had an idea. She remembered what luna told her what she and leo did to cheer each other up.

Akiza sat down next to her while she was calming down from her freak out session. "You know, I learned a trick that might help you snap out of your funk". Carly's eyes snapped over to her in anticipation. "What do I do?" Carly asked. "It's simple, raise your arms". Carly did so, still not catching onto her scheme. Akiza then smirked and tickled her armpits, ribs and belly. Within a second, carly's eyes widened, then a giant dumb grin appeared, then finally she burst out laughing. GAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA- WHAHAHAHAHAHAT ARE YOHOHOHOHU DOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOING, HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA THAHAHAHAHAHAHA TIHIHIHIHIHICKLES TOOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO MUHUHUHUHUHUCH Akiza had a playful smile as she tortured poor carly. "Yep, this is what I learned to help you out. I think you could use a laugh after everything". Carly was laughing endlessly.

Tears formed as she howled hysterically but she hadn't put her arms down. "Oh man, how'd she know I was ticklish. But this is kinda fun, I guess I needed this". Carly thought to herself through her hysterics. Tears flowed down her face as she laughed herself crazy but she was feeling better. She fell back on the couch, hugging herself in a vain attempt to guard herself from the playful assault. Minutes later and carly was a mess. Tears wouldn't stop falling. Her hair stuck to her face and her glasses had fallen off. She didn't have the energy to kick or flail her arms so she was simply lying there, taking the torture but she was enjoying herself. She knew she looked a mess but she didn't care. She hadn't felt this happy in a while so she really wanted to enjoy it just a little longer. Finally akiza stopped and let carly get herself together. After a few minutes, carly was back to her old self but that smile never left her face. "I guess I needed that. Thanks akiza." Akiza smiled and carly smiled back only there was something playful about that look. Soon-
1221.title: Akiza

12211.content:
Before akiza could react, carly lunged forward and scribbled her fingers on akiza's armpits causing the black rose to fall back laughing loudly. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PAHAHAHAHAHAYBACK HUHUHUHUHUHUHUHUHUH, *SNORT* HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Carly held a playful smile as she tortured akiza. She noticed that as akiza was laying there, laughing, like a little kid, she never put her arms down to defend herself. Akiza's armpits were her most sensitive spot but despite her increasing laughter, she never put them down. She was honestly having a lot of fun."Who knew being tickled like this was so much fun. I really have to thank those kids." Akiza thought to herself among her laughter.

Minutes passed but akiza was in her own slice of heaven. Tears were freely flowing down her face as she laughed herself silly but she loved the feeling. She couldn't help but feel like a kid again. Carly had pinned her hands over her head as she tortured her armpits and belly. The black rose had fallen victim to silent laughter. It was a bit of torture for her-she couldn't get enough. This was the most fun she's had in years. Carly soon stopped and let akiza breathe. She then got off her and helped akiza up as well. "Enjoy your payback?" akiza asked with a smile. Carly couldn't suppress a chuckle and simply nodded. "I had to get you back. Besides, maybe a new paper is on order. The Black Rose:ticklish?. What a riveting story, don't you think"? Carly asked teasing.

Akiza lunged forward and tickled her armpits getting loud laughter out of carly. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HEHEHEHEHEHEY IHIHIHIHIHIM JUST JOHOHOHOHOHOKING Carly doubled over cackling as her upper body was tortured. Despite her hysterics, she never tried to escape or defend herself. Turns out carly enjoyed being tickled as well. Although she was more sensitive then her. She was already starting to cry from laughing so hard. Akiza then scratched her nails on her belly, causing her to fall to the floor in silent laughter. "Guess I found her tickle spot" akiza thought. Carly was in tears and her laughter was non stop. Her legs kicked out aimlessly and she couldn't stop squirming. Suddenly she accidentally kicked akiza off her. While akiza rubbed her chest, carly was calming down from her laughing fit. She then became aware of what she did and frantically apologized. The two girls just laughed it off as an accident. Guess they both needed a laugh.
12211.title: Carly gets akiza

1222.content:
Carly was laughing hysterically as misty tortured her armpits endlessly. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA IHIHIHIHIHIH NEHEHEHEHEHEHEEDED THIHIHIHIHIHIS *SNORT*HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA-PFFTHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Misty just shook her head with a slightly amused smile. "You actually wanted this huh"? She thought to herself. Earlier-that same day.

"Are you ok carly"? Misty asked concerned. Carly sighed."Jack's been ignoring me whenever I try to help him. I can be of use to team 5ds too". Carly explained. Misty looked at her with worry. She didn't like seeing her friend down like this. She then got an idea and smirked. "Carly, I think I have an idea to get you smiling again". Carly looked at her with curiosity. End of flashback

Carly was laughing harder every second but she was keeping her arms up, enjoying herself. She had fallen into her friend's lap, squirming but refusing to defend herself. Behind her glasses, tears of joy were forming in her grey eyes as she laughed endlessly. Misty smiled down at her hysterical friend, happy to see her laughing again.

The girl in question had put her arms down, pinning misty's hands in her armpits, making it tickle more. Tears were freely falling as carly laughed loudly, kicking her feet around from laughing. She was rolling in her lap, making half attempts to guard her weak spot but she didn't try too hard. Carly's hair stuck to her face and tears stained her face as well but she was feeling great, better then before. Her troubles were fading as her mind melted under misty's friendly assault. Soon-
1222.title: Misty tickles carly

12221.content:
Akiza and the twins decided to hang out at the twins house. They played a few games, watched some good and bad movies, and even had a few dozen duels. After a while, the twins still had some energy left while akiza grew tired. She decided to take a nap on the couch. Leo and luna decided to sit next to her sleeping form to keep her company. "She looks so peaceful when she's like this" Luna said. "Yea, it almost makes you forget how scary she can be". Leo said. "That's cause of you, you know". Luna teased. Leo looked away grumbling. Minutes later, both twins were sitting next to each other as akiza slept. Leo then looked over at akiza who was still fast asleep. "Man, she's out cold. Guess we really tuckered her out huh"? Leo thought to himself.

A mischievous smile then over took him and he poked akiza's side out of mischief and slight boredom. Luna then saw her brother. "Leo, what are you doing? You'll disturb her". "No i'm not, look at her. She's completely out". The black rose was lying on her stomach, her head resting on her arms. Leo the poked her side a few more times. "See, nothing". Leo said. Luna then got curious and poked near her armpit, getting seemingly no response. "Whoa, he's right". Luna thought. Akiza then shifted in her sleep, a smile hidden on her face. The twins couldn't help themselves and kept poking her for no real reason other then boredom. Unbeknownst to them, akiza had woken up when leo first poked her side. She had kept her eyes closed, hiding giggles. She put her face directly on the couch, muffling her giggles, enjoying the tickly pokes. Both kids were genuinely amused by this stupid antic of leo's. Akiza was no different. She was pretending to be asleep, muffling her giggling. Luna smirked and poked her armpits a few times. Akiza was now muffling whole laughing fits, kinda hoping they wouldn't stop. "Oh man, it tickles". Akiza thought to herself.

"Wow, she's really out of it". Leo said. He then joined his sister, poking her underarms as well. Akiza felt herself tear up with muffled laughter and was slightly shuffling but keeping her weak spot unguarded. After luna got bold and wiggled her finger in her armpit:that was it.(heh,rhyme) Akiza lifted her head back on her hands, fully laughing, startling the kids. The kids jumped back, wondering whether they should run or not. Although they stopped, akiza couldn't stop laughing for a bit. When she finally got control of herself, she opened her eyes, looking at the slightly scared kids.

"What was that for? That really tickled". Akiza said, unable to wipe that smile of her face. "It was leo's idea". Luna blurt out of fear. Leo looked at her betrayed, even tho it was true. She then got up and approached the trembling kids. "guess I need to tell you kids what happens when i'm woken up". The twins hugged each other out of fear. Then much to their surprise they found themselves laughing as she started tickling their bellies. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA-HEHEHEHEHEY CUT IHIHIT OUT Both kids burst into hysterics as their shared weak spot was tortured. Akiza held a playful smile as she drove the kids crazy with laughter. Both fell to the floor, laughing harder every second. Leo rolled side to side while luna curled into a ball, crying with laughter. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OHOHOHOHOK WERE SHAHAHAHAHAHARY HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHHEHEASE WERE SOHOHOHOHOHOHOHOHORY Akiza stopped and let the kids breathe. "I forgive you kids, just don't do that again". Akiza said. Both kids nodded and ecided to just watch some tv while akiza decided to go back to sleep.
12221.title: What's up with akiza

12222.content:
Luna was laughing loudly as leo tickled her armpits. The younger signer was holding her arms behind her head as her favorite tickle spot was tortured nonstop. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HOHOHOHOHOW LOHHOHOHOHOHOHONG HAS IT BEEHEHEHEHEHEN? Leo looked at his stopwatch and saw that she had lasted 9 minutes of nonstop tickling. "It's been 9 minutes luna."Leo said, keeping his sister laughing. "Still can't believe this is happening". Leo thought to himself over his sister's cackling. She and akiza had decided to have another armpit tickle challenge tomorrow so she asked leo to help her build some resistance. It did help that the twins loved having their armpits tickled but they could only take so much. Luna was crying with laughter but she was having fun, even though in her melting mind she was training.

She eventually put her arms down, unable to take anymore. As she caught her breath, leo told her she had now lasted 10 minutes. Better then her previous time: 8 minutes. "Thanks Leo, i'm no doubt going to beat akiza in this challenge". Luna said tired but determined. Leo had a*seriously* look on his face. As much as he enjoyed making his sister laugh, but this was odd. "Something wrong, Leo"? Luna asked. "I'm fine, it's just I can't believe this is happening". Leo said. "It's kinda strange I admit but it was kinda fun the last time we did this. *Smirks* Plus you can't deny this is kinda fun". She said as she playfully tickled her brother's sides. "Hahahaahahaha ok hahaha ok it's kinda fun." Leo said, recovering from his giggle fit. "I wonder what akiza thinks of this"? Leo thought.
12222.title: Luna tickle training (Wait ,what?)

Akiza was laughing hysterically as carly tortured her underarms for what felt like forever. Similar to luna, she was holding her hands behind her head laughing loudly as her worst spot was tortured. She then dropped her arms hugging herself as she tried to stop laughing. "Haha how ha long was that"? akiza asked, still giggling. "6 minutes. You and luna are serious about this huh"? carly asked. Akiza nodded. They had done this during the dark signer incident as a way to cheer themselves up. She then remembered what they said to each other when they were alone.

"That was actually kinda fun. I can't name the last time I laughed that hard, or at all really". Akiza said. Luna looked at the older girl with a smile. ""Well, better get back to training, unless you want a kid to show you up again". Carly said, really wanting that interview. Akiza doubled over laughing harder then before. "Come on, lift your arms. We're still training here". Carly said. HAHAHAHAHAHA I CAN'T HEHEHEHELP IHIHIHIT. IT TIHIHIHIHHICKLES TOO MUCH.

1222212.content:
Luna laughed until tears ran down her face as her brother tickled her nonstop. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA IHIHIHIHIHIHIS THAT IHIHIHIHIT PFFTHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA This time she was lying on her stomach, pinning her hands under head, leaving her underarms exposed. Poor luna laughed endlessly. As much as she liked being tickled by her brother, there was only so much she could take. But her determination for this(ridiculous) challenge helped her break through. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA MY BEHEHEHEHEHELLY TICKLE MY BEHEHEHEHEHEHELLY "Luna, are you sure"? Leo asked concerned. She was already laughing up a storm. If her weak spit was tickled now, she'd probably pass out from laughing too much. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA I CAHAHAHAN TAKE IHIHIHIHIT HAHAHAHAHAHAHA DO IT

Leo hesitated but he then followed through with his sister's request. Using one hand, he continued torturing her armpit and with his free hand, he slipped it under her stomach and started tickling it. Luna eyes widened before she succumbed to silent laughter. She no longer had the energy to move so all she could do was lay there and laugh. Her enjoyment of being tickled was helping her but it was becoming harder to handle. Tears fell endlessly as she silently howled. Just as she felt she was going to pass out, she heard leo's timer go off and leo stopped as well. For a while, she just lied there, trying to breathe.

When she finally got the energy to move, she asked leo how long she lasted. "15 minutes. You lasted 15 minutes. On your weak spot no less. But wait, why there anyway"? Leo asked confused. HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA THAHAHAHAT TIHIHIHIHIHIHICKLES SO MUHUHUUHHUHUHUHUHUCH. Patty had snaked her arms through luna's jacket sleeves, leaving the blue haired girl a hysterical mess. Roars of laughter echoed thorough the house and all luna did whenever she had the chance to breathe was beg for more. Her eyes were glued shut as she howled hysterically, loving every second of her torture. Tears of joy streamed down her face nonstop. Luna was having the time of her life. She actually doubted even leo could make her laugh this hard,and he knew what would make her laugh the most. What felt like an hour later, lua was a crying, laughing mess. Her two pigtails had come undone allowing her hair to blind her. Tears stuck to her face and she had fallen victim to silent laughter. Yet patty could tell she was having fun. After a few more minute they decided to-
125322111222111121221.title: Tickle lover luna

1253222.content:
Luna laughed loudly as her armpits were tickled by her friend. The blue-haired girl kept her armpits unguarded, enjoying the ticklish feeling. Patty couldn't hold back a smile as she continued with their little joke. "I can't fight it luna. She's too strong. pfft-hehehe" HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OHOHOHOHOH NOHOHOHOHOHOHOOHO NOHOHOHOHOHOT TIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIS HHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA Patty smirked and switched to her belly. AAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOHO NOHOHOHOHOHOHOT MY BEHEHEHEHEHEHEHELLY HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA NOHOHOHOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEHEHEHEHERE Luna couldn't help but squirm and roll around to escape but she put little to no effort into it.

Luna rolled onto her stomach and patty jammed her hands under her stomach, getting silent laughter from her. Tears started falling as luna silently howled as her weak spot was tortured. Patty wasn't worried about her. She knew thanks to leo that she was loving this. It never failed to surprise her how much stamina she had. Leo told patty she once asked him to tickle her to cheer her up after a few bad days. Luna ended up laughing her sorrows away for about an hour. The was a wreck by the time she finally asked him to stop but she couldn't have felt better. Speaking of which, patty noticed luna was completely sobbing from laughing so hard. "She's more ticklish here then I thought." Patty thought surprised. Finally patty topped and allowed her friend to breathe. Luna spent a good 5 minutes catching her breathe and wiping away any tears.

"Are you alright?" Patty asked. Luna simply nodded, unable to wipe a smile off her face. "Will you be?" Luna thought to herself as she tickled patty's belly. Hehehehehehey heheheheheheheheheheheh Hahahahahahahahahahahaha nohohohohoho fahahahahahahahahir Patty leaned back on her hands allowing her belly to be prodded. Unlike the twins, patty's belly was her favorite tickle spot. Patty threw her head back and laughed in delight, enjoying the feeling. Patty started tearing up slightly from her laughter and luna barely started. "In a way, she's almost as ticklish as me." Luna thought. For the next few minutes the girls seemed to abandon their joke and just had fun making each other laugh.
1253222.title: Patty's playful payback plus fun
